title: Strategy of Elimination
text: To be able to eliminate variables, multiply the first equation by $$-3$$ and add it to equation $$2$$ to remove the $$x^2$$ term.

title: Expression in terms of $$y$$
text: What is the resulting expression in terms of only $$y$$ after simplifying?

title: Value of $$x$$
text: To solve for the value of $$x$$, substitute the values of $$y$$ into the equations.

title: Positive and Negative
text: Make sure to account for both the positive and negative answer when taking the square root.
